    game.online

    • Uses of ClientHandler in game.online

      Methods in game.online with parameters of type ClientHandler 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GOGame.makeMove(ClientHandler player, java.lang.String move)
      Broadcasts a move made by a player in correct format.
      void GOGame.quit(ClientHandler player)
      Handles a player who quits the game.
      void GOGame.sendChat(ClientHandler player, java.lang.String msg)
      Broadcasts chat message from given player to all the players in the game.

      Constructor and Description

    • Uses of ClientHandler in server.model

      Methods in server.model with parameters of type ClientHandler 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GOServer.addRequestedGame(ClientHandler handler)
      Adds client to requestedGame, removes from lobby and checks it enough clients in requestedGame to start a game.
      void GOServer.addToLobby(ClientHandler handler)
      Adds handler to lobby.
      void GOServer.removeFromLobby(ClientHandler handler)
      Removes client from lobby.
      void GOServer.removeInGame(ClientHandler handler)
      Removes client from list inGame and adds to lobby.
      void GOServer.removeRequestedGame(ClientHandler handler)
      Removes client from requestedGame if on that list.
